item.description:
So, the new year has just begun and you're itching to test out your spelling...

Join Cynthia at Cornerstone Books in Salem for a night of Scrabble playing.

Everyone will meet in the Cornerstone Cafe (where you can also purchase coffee, tea, and pastries). If you have an extra Scrabble board that is easy to tote along, please bring it. As our first official all-Scrabble event, hopefully all of you word lovers will have a wonderful time.

After the games have been played from 7:00-9:00, the group will head over to In a Pig's Eye for food and drinks.

The number listed below is Cynthia's number, not the number to Cornerstone.
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find Cynthia in the Cornerstone Cafe with her Scrabble set.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Scrabble Night
